title: Omicron’s Economic Impact Amid The Holiday Shopping Season
itunes:title: Omicron’s Economic Impact Amid The Holiday Shopping Season
description:
Sam Fazeli, Senior Pharmaceutical Analyst and Head of EMEA Research with Bloomberg Intelligence, discusses what we know about Omicron, the latest coronavirus variant, and how effective vaccines can be in limiting its spread. Matt Forester, Chief Investment Officer for Lockwood Advisors at BNY Mellon Pershing, offers his outlook on holiday shopping amid supply chain bottlenecks and the Omicron variant. Jeffrey Kleintop, Charles Schwab Chief Global Investment Strategist, discusses his market outlook amid the emergence of Omicron. Anjee Solanki, National Director of Retail Services for the US for Colliers, talks about retail activity ahead of the holidays. Hosted by Paul Sweeney and Matt Miller.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
